en.title: WeChat Mini Program
en.prompt: Create a WeChat Mini Program page with wxml, js, wxss, and json files that implements a [Project]. Provide only the necessary code to meet these requirements without explanations or descriptions.
en.remark: Auxiliary WeChat mini program development. Contributed by @gandli.

metaDescription: Developing a WeChat Mini Program? This prompt generates the necessary wxml, js, wxss, and json files for your project, saving you valuable development time.
